name: Gotham General Hospital
description: A major hospital in Gotham City that plays a significant role in 'The Dark Knight'.

content.title: History
content.body: Gotham General Hospital is one of the primary healthcare facilities in Gotham City. In the universe of 'The Dark Knight', it serves as a backdrop for several important events, underscoring the chaotic times the city faces under the Joker's menace.

content.title: Geography
content.body: Located in the bustling, crime-ridden environment of Gotham City, the hospital is an essential service provider to the population, marked by its distinctive architectural design typical of Gotham's skyline.

content.title: Notable Features
content.body: The hospital is equipped with emergency rooms, intensive care units, and specialized departments, providing comprehensive services to the community. Its capacity to handle large-scale emergencies is depicted in 'The Dark Knight'.

content.title: Story Significance
content.body: In 'The Dark Knight', Gotham General Hospital becomes a pivotal plot point when the Joker orchestrates an explosive disaster, highlighting his threat to the city's safety and testing the resolve of characters like Harvey Dent and Batman.
